title: How Riot does reworks
body:
Old Poppy
http://pm1.narvii.com/5926/8a5508e12282fc83bcd07200246ac331653a9a99_hq.jpg

New Poppy
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/da/Poppy_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151124201921

Old Sion
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/3e/Sion_OriginalSkin_old.jpg

New Sion
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Sion_0.jpg

Old Taric
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/4d/Taric_OriginalSkin_old.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20100211032339

New Taric
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d4/Taric_OriginalSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110602121637

So by this logic, here's old Yorick
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Yorick_0.jpg

And this is how they'll make new Yorick
http://i.imgur.com/I5LFqd1.png

replies.body: They better keep Yorick as a sarcastic ugly hunchback. Don't need some bishie straight from an anime for people to cosplay.
Just because you said that I would love to see anime yorick

I have found it.

http://i.imgur.com/aZ0bFey.jpg
Looks like a fabulous Hitler to me.
No, that is a super kawaii Hitler.

That manga is comedy gold.
Also that's Hitler.

> [{quoted}](name=RangerofShadows,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Zu9tU2Lp,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-04-06T00:12:51.173+0000)
>
> Just because you said that I would love to see anime yorick

Star Guardian Yorik
In combo with star guardian Urgot

y u do dis ._.
Probably exists somewhere already, wouldn't surprise me :l

I wouldn't mind if they lost the hunchback honestly. That limp is the most pathetic thing I have ever seen. I DO agree on the whole "don't make him a handsome devil" part though. A hideous undead being with a cane and a shovel...idk something like this

[(https://41.media.tumblr.com/58f824af727087ca4d5e863ccc3bd46f/tumblr_nrmuyyStAz1spa79lo1_500.png)](https://41.media.tumblr.com/58f824af727087ca4d5e863ccc3bd46f/tumblr_nrmuyyStAz1spa79lo1_500.png)
Part of the character to me is that he's very much a being of zero importance or value to the world. He's the working man - just doing his job because it's his job.

I still hope Yorick beats people with a shovel in his rework. It's pretty unique honestly. 

So is the necromancy. But still, shovels.

Necromancy NEEDS to stay..
The shovel is fun, but Necromancy NEEDS to stay.
Just like beefyness, self healing and the quote ''You will remember Yorick Mori''
{{summoner:31}}
Agreed. Shovel smacking is more of a personal preference.

http://cdn.smosh.com/sites/default/files/ftpuploads/bloguploads/0613/smash-bros-villager-meme-erase-you.jpg

Yorick rework details leaked
Uhh...
Villager is scary man. Does that look like the face of mercy?
So the Soldier from TF2 is replacing Yorick?

> [{quoted}](name=LordForrest,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Zu9tU2Lp,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-04-06T07:30:09.030+0000)
>
> So the Soldier from TF2 is replacing Yorick?

I'd be very happy with that.

You forgot Gangplank :(

Edit: and Tristana :(
I don't recall them being quite as ugly before their VUs though.
You're kidding right?  If you're new, you probably don't remember good ol' pube chest, but holy shit was Tristana UGLY.  She was more of a hunchback than Yorick is.
I'm not that new, I played Tristana before her recent VU. She seemed much more cartoony but I guess I found that more acceptable for a yordle.
GP wasn't, but Tristana was. That's why I  bought Rocket Girl, because otherwise I'd have had to use the old Riot Girl. *shudder*

Well, to be honest, you guys have said (even to me) that they aren't on the same scale as those above. You made it quite clear that GP and Trist got visual and minor kit updates (even though GP's E was completely changed, his R got bonuses, his Q lost its slow, his passive got completely changed, and his W got minor tweaks (as well as a completely new model; twice)) so they aren't on the same scale. Sion and Poppy went from Fighters to Tanks. Taric went from a Support/Fighter to a Support/Tank (why hasn't it been changed yet on the PBE? I don't care if his abilities are just tweaked versions of what they once where, his W and E are even more like a Tank's CC and his Q and R are basically support stuff. His Q still works off of bonus health. His passive, W and E do stuff with his armor. Please tell me he is going to be changed to a Support/Tank so I don't look crazy (  0_o)).

I was more referring to the fact that they got all new VO, Models and Animations. Not the Gameplay, since this was more a post about the visuals changing. GP and Trist actually changed quite a bit visually from there previous models/art. Not AS much as the ones mentioned above but comparing old GP splash to new GP splash is a pretty big difference.
Fiora (maybe)? She looks more slim in new splash, and Viktor too.
fiora new splash and visuals look worse than old ones (much better kit tho)
*sigh* I still miss her old outfit.
Well she's fine now that they fixed her hair.

and Fiddle stick oh wait..{{champion:9}} 
he stick in the mud

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Zu9tU2Lp,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2016-04-06T14:10:26.083+0000)
>
> You forgot Gangplank :(
> 
> Edit: and Tristana :(

And Karma!....Rip her fans
The twist is that Yorick looks the same but all his ghouls are sexy as hell.
Ult: makes a very attractive copy of an ally, stunning all enemies facing it for 3 seconds. If it is Taric than they just die.
Calvin Klein skin confirmed for Yorick after his rework.

Don't let new Taric intimidate you Derp, Just picture him in his underwear
*Imagines*
OH NO HE'S HOT
Watch them pull a {{champion:114}} and give him "let me talk to your manager" hair.
http://orig14.deviantart.net/b6dc/f/2015/198/5/2/yorick_rework___league_of_legends_by_krizalidbrando-d91nksm.png

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Zu9tU2Lp,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-04-06T03:52:00.693+0000)
>
> http://orig14.deviantart.net/b6dc/f/2015/198/5/2/yorick_rework___league_of_legends_by_krizalidbrando-d91nksm.png

Yorick is a tragic figure. He is tragedy. Yorick needs to be a pitiful, half-formed reject. He is to be brooding and melancholic who only finds answers from is moribund work. This doesn't quite fit that look.
I just realized that, in the new Sion splash, you're looking up at him (presumably from lying on the ground, defeated) through your helmet.  Neat.
You're Helmet Bro

What will urgot look like.....

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/cd/f7/f6/cdf7f6664cf32bf3805c54976259e8ce.jpg
I find him kind of endearing with his current look even if the model itself is a bit outdated tbh
Does that mean Urgot will also model for men's underwear??!?!

How would he even do this.
He can't even wear pants!
Put it on his head silly
YES PLEASE
{{champion:6}} FeelsGoodMan
New Yorik so sexy xD

http://elohell.net/chill/379286/that-would-be-so-nice
Like this then?
